original_text: The people of Assyria and its whole army are there in their graves! All of them died in battle. The people of Assyria and its whole army are there in their graves! All of them died in battle. The people of Assyria and its whole army are there in their graves! All of them died in battle.
korean_text: 거기에 앗수르와 그 온 무리가 있음이여 다 죽임을 당하여 칼에 엎드러진 자라 그 무덤이 그 사방에 있도다

sentences.original_text: The people of Assyria are there
and its whole army are there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 온 군대가 그곳에 있다

sentences.original_text: All of them died in battle
